title: Help me please rito
body:
I uh, I don't get what's going on? Every time I log in I get this black screen with a little box (Same as newbie tips box) with the option "Don't show me these tips again" 
Nothing else loads... I have reinstalled and tried to start the program through Admin rights.

replies.body: I encountered this exact issue today because I ran out of disk space while installing the new patch, I decided to use the Repair option and it completely fixed my issue.  Repair's located at the upper right of the client by clicking on the little question mark icon and selecting Repair.  It should take between ten minutes and an hour, but usually around a half hour.
You absolute legend! {{champion:119}}  Problem fixed in a {{summoner:4}}

> [{quoted}](name=SoCloseToStoned,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=uMLIUQ8z,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-04-07T10:10:58.467+0000)
>
> You absolute legend! {{champion:119}}  Problem fixed in a {{summoner:4}}

Haha no worries, glad I could help!  :D
